law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 89, effective July 1, 1982. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Agreement consolidating oil and gas leases may be executed by guardian or conservator.
metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 95 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1,1982.
